channel.title: Should I Do It? Post A Thread On RS Forums REALLY Educating Them?
channel.description:
Hey, I really can't stand all these little uneducated faggots talking shit about Mopar. Personally, I think that MoparScape is completely useless unless soemone wants to make rs movies. But, I really can't take it anymore.. I want to post a thread on the rs forums, educating them all. I want to do it without getting banned, and I think I know how. No one ever got banned for asking a question =) I'm thinking of posting something along the lines of this to keep from the ban stick.
Hey, I was just wondering something... People say that Moparscape is illegal, and that it has keyloggers and such, but I've never seen anyone sued or hacked from it... Personally, I've never downloaded it, simply because it sounds like it's useless unless I was making a RuneScape movie.. But, I've wondered for a while why Jagex hasn't sued them, or people hacked by them haven't come forward. Really doesn't make sense to me. Please post your opinions. Thanks, Buzzy
I don't know what board to post it in, so if someone could help with that, it'd be cool. Anyways, think I should do it, might make one of the less close-minded idiots realize it's all lies... Anyways.. Thanks, Buzzy

item.title: Should I Do It? Post A Thread On RS Forums REALLY Educating Them?
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“the outcasted user, post:24, topic:134178”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=185563.msg1687058#msg1687058 date=1187601747]
do it! or i will now! actually all of us should post topics about mopar in the forums! we will make our first attack against runescape! (forums) so we gonna do it?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2007, 09:59:39 PM[/size][hr]i jsut did 2 minutes of it up and its locked and id idn’t break any rules dman mods

also just edditted all ym posts…
[/quote]

the forum mods are stupid[/quote]

yup and then i sent jagex a message through customer support about it and they had a stern conversation with me

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote author=pko link=topic=185563.msg1681443#msg1681443 date=1187371891]

[quote=“the outcasted user, post:15, topic:134178”]lol i did that once
got warning
and got 300 pages
stupid fourm mods ars arsholes

your retarded.

and if you were to post, make it a bit more smart, not so many … and use some grammar.[/quote]

You are retarted. For one, you cant blame people if they dont use grammer. Such as you being and idiotic nerd that always follows the rules. I am using grammer as it is stated in the rules. But you my [size=6pt]very[/size] fat friend. You follow all the rules, so please dont critize him. Maybe this colour will appeal to your large eyes.

But I think it really doesn’t matter. I’ll still do it if people think I should.
